I have been playing this game for a long time on two different platforms now, and I can honestly say that it never loses it's gaming value. I have loved it for thirteen long years, seeing as it was my very first Xbox 360 game, and continue to love and appreciate everything that it is. I have introduced so many people to this because it is one of the best ways to play together in a co-op setting. It is seriously the game that just keeps on giving.
